description.value:
You can study the sun and gaze upon any place its light touches. You can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{Clairaudience/Clairvoyance} as a spell-like ability, but only for visual observation and you can only place your sensor in places currently being touched by sunlight.

At 10th level, you can instead use @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{Scrying} to observe any area touched by sunlight.

At 15th level, you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{Scrying, Greater} instead. You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

You can sungaze for 1 minute per day per oracle level; the duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.
